import React from 'react'; import styled from 'styled-components'; import useStyles from '../Offers-jss'; import Helmet from "react-helmet"; import { WEBSITE_NAME } from "../../../../utils/websiteData"; import DonationIcon from '../../../../images/donation-icon.svg'; import Solidarity from '../../../../images/solidarity.svg'; import BloodIcon from '../../../../images/blood-icon.svg'; import Other from '../../../../images/other.svg'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const StyledDiv = styled.div` width: 60%; margin: 16px auto; border: 1px solid #eee; box-shadow: 0 2px 3px #ccc; padding: 16px; text-align: center; @media (min-width: 500px) { width: 450px; } `; const classes = useStyles(); const Hea = () => { return (
{`${WEBSITE_NAME} | Offers`}

What does Social Charities provide ?

Social aid

gifts and grants for workers on the occasions of marriage, new born, circumcision, and others

Health services

Help employees patients or relatives in their chirurgical operations or medical treatment and others

Solidarity

Give financial aids to those in need of money, tools or resources , specially those in difficult health and financial conditions

Other services

exceptional loans for school staff, organize cultural and sports activities and other related activities

 ) } export default Hea ;
